title: Welcome and overview of language learning activities at INESC-ID

The Research Institute of Institute Superior Technique, where you will you are and.

Human Language technologies group.
It's really a pleasure to host this meeting here, so.
A little bit about our own Research Institute.
We are the Research Institute that brings together computer science and electrical and computer engineering from our University.
For short, when we when you hear the name technical, that's what we call the engineering University where we are.
This Research Institute has about 9200 integrated researchers and our mission.
As you can see, is to develop tomorrow's technologies by excelling in research today, which sounds very nice.

That's our initial background.

Instead of, for instance, wanting to do machine translation from text to text, we are able to do machine translation from speech to speech, which is just so much more ambition than we can do.

Very, very promising for us.

Spoken language processing group.
It includes around 30 researchers, but that includes professors, postdoctoral researchers, and graduate students.

Of course working on that.

Recommendation systems we work on security privacy cyber bullying.
We worked on smart homes and on communications.

But we brought many games around this.
This to make it interesting as a language learning too and it was very successful for a short while while it last.

We we did.

We did a lot.

Text to sign translation.

With the therapist and provide lots of rewards to the kids that they really love.

I and we've been adopting this type of things for cognitive decline to prevent cognitive decline, specially with the elderly.
With making you know, quiz games to to work on daycare centers.
We are.

With them in a number of projects and now we are surrounded by many other companies working on language learning and some of them will have their presence here in this meeting and very happy for that.
